prodigality.question: Have I excessively and wastefully indulged in financial activities that prioritize entertainment over meeting my important responsibilities, potentially jeopardizing my ability to provide for those who rely on me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: for the sake of excitement or
gossip.question: Have I indulged in sharing others' private affairs, even if true, for the sake of excitement or to prove a point?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: through sharing private or unverified information
gossip.question: Have I entertained thoughts or conversations that harmed others' reputations through sharing private or unverified information, even if what was shared seemed true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
